alert.note: Alert for Callaway; Gasconade; Montgomery; Osage (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 4:57PM CDT until June 30 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Montgomery County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Callaway County in central Missouri... Northeastern Osage County in central Missouri... Northern Gasconade County in east central Missouri... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chamois, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter sized hail in Mokane. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hermann, Chamois, Swiss, Big Spring, Gasconade, Mokane, Rhineland, Morrison, McKittrick, Portland, Americus, Reform, and Steedman. This also includes Deutschheim Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in St Louis.
